output: A herd of wild horses thunders across a wide expanse of golden grassland, their manes flowing like liquid fire in the warm glow of the setting sun. Their hooves churn up clouds of dust that dance on the golden breeze, casting long shadows across the undulating plains. Distant mountain peaks pierce the horizon, bathed in the last light of day, creating the impression of a limitless world stretching before them. Capture the untamed spirit and boundless freedom etched upon their faces as they gallop towards the setting sun.
